review: Got this for my mom, who is a senior with macular degeneration.Can already get to Amazon Prime with a Roku but this remote isjust so much easier for my mom to use and the Prime interface menu is easier to navigate.It's worth it to us to keep the Fire TV Stick on/tuned to the Amazon Prime app and the Roku on Netflixfor ease of use.
author: kkdigerati "kkdigerati"

review: I will update after we use for awhile longer, but first impressions have been great! The fire stick was very easy to set up, connected to our WiFi without difficulty, and seems to have good range (our router is upstairs) and the fire stick is downstairs).  Videos play from amazon prime and Netflix well.  The interface is easy to use.  I hear that there's an app you can use for a remote... looking forward to trying that.  Overall, I'm impressed and am looking to purchase another stick for my daughter's bedroom.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Until now there are some apps I often use that appear unavailable on the stick, like YouTube. And there are others feature apps unavailable also (ESPN for example). It also lacks a good DNLA app to play my collection of movies.So far I've been able to play only movies from Netflix, those from amazon prime always show a "license error".
author: alexherr

review: i'm having a problem with streaming/buffering taking too long. other than that it was simple to set up and once I get this problem taken care of I plan to order a coule more
author: carol anne smith

review: Bought Fire TV Stick as an alternative to Apple TV in the guest room. We have Amazon Prime so it is great that we get Netflix and Prime video in one device. Can't beat it for the value...... but if you have all your music on iTune then it is not ideal.

review: Love it, picks up the wifi perfectly (we have trouble with other devices, but not this)

review: Works great, no issues and very easy to set up and use.

review: We love Fire Stick.  It was super easy to set up and to navigate and I like all the apps and options available.  Can't wait to see what else is added.
